sourcesContent:
import { useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import gql from 'graphql-tag' import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import PaginationStyles from './styles/PaginationStyles' import DisplayError from './ErrorMessage' import {perPage} from '../config' export const PAGINATION_QUERY = gql` query PAGINATION_QUERY { _allProductsMeta { count } } ` export default function Pagination({page}){ const {error, loading, data} = useQuery(PAGINATION_QUERY) if(loading) return 'Loading...' if(error) return const { count } = data._allProductsMeta const pageCount = Math.ceil(count / perPage) return( Sick Fits - Page {page} of {pageCount} ☚ Prev

Page {page} of {pageCount}

{count} Items Total

= pageCount}> Next ☛ ) }
